children.name: urllib3.exceptions.MaxRetryError: HTTPConnectionPool(host='10.1.138.139', port=49152): Max retries exceeded with url: /metrics (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPConnection object at 0x7fc2b25692d0>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 111] Connection refused'))
test_build_and_deploy
tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

children.name:
AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:22:18Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     160  10.152.183.154  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.60   no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.227  no       

Unit                 Workload  Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active    idle   10.1.39.10         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active    idle   10.1.39.11         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+92ba15a
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active    idle   10.1.39.13         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+92ba15a
mysql-router-k8s/2   blocked   idle   10.1.39.14         Upgrade incompatible. Rollback to previous revision with `juju refresh`
mysql-test-app/0*    active    idle   10.1.39.9          
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:22:18Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.60   no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.227  no       

Unit                 Workload  Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active    idle   10.1.39.10         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active    idle   10.1.39.11         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+92ba15a
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active    idle   10.1.39.13         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+92ba15a
mysql-router-k8s/2   blocked   idle   10.1.39.14         Upgrade incompatible. Rollback to previous revision with `juju refresh`
mysql-test-app/0*    active    idle   10.1.39.9          
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7fa9659670a0>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7fa9659670a0> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7fa964d76ec0>.model
